name: Echo Forest #3855
description: Weâ€™ve created 10,000 unique NFTs, each representing a character in the fantasy world called the Echoverse. Every NFT in our collection is a combination of 1 of 10 different forest animals, with an assigned class or profession and is equipped with anywhere from 2-4 items that vary in rarity from common to unique. The utility of the Echo Forest NFT comes in two forms; earning EXP tokens and voting in the Echo Forest DAO.
